originalText.text:
Fresh Direct Manhattan
Epic fail.  I have been buying from FreshDirect for years without very many poor incidences. However, this is the first time I have ordered in many months, and what a huge disappointment! I took pictures of the produce and bread last week when I received it to complain about the quality however, this week, I am adding to it due to the spoilage rate as well.

I was shocked by how filthy the celery and cilantro was and there was so much sand in the cilantro and so much dirt in the celery that it was clear the produce hadnâ€™t even been given a perfunctory washdown.

The bagels and the sourdough bread were stale when I received them, so I ordered another loaf uncut the next day. However, those two bread products have since gone completely bad and moldy, see pictures attached. This tells me the product is either not being stored correctly or is being bought very late in the game and is already on the verge of spoilage by the time itâ€™s delivered. Thatâ€™s my personal take.

Of course I will go back to FreshDirect because i find them terribly convenient and overall this is my first terrible experience. but another experience like this would drive me away permanently.

Also, worth noting since they changed the bag styles to no longer have a cover flap and we were experiencing heavy rain, there was about a half an inch to an inch of water in the bottom of each bag. Not nice.

originalText.text: We have been using Fresh Direct for two to three years. We started small and now order 80 to 90% of our groceries from this company. I just wanted to let everyone know how pleased we are with the quality service  and customer care!!! The quality of the vegetables are what keeps us coming back week after week!!! We have recommended FD to all our friends. Do yourself a huge favor give them a try!!!! Melissa and Phil
